name: News the Bomb Man
description:
This is more of an experimental game, so don't expect a polished product. This game was made in 7 days for the Explosive Game Jam hosted by my friend BBomb.

The Theme for the Jam was: Out of Bounds

Discord: 📜rules (discord.com)

Youtube: Hallowd Games - YouTube

Twitch:  HallowdPlays - Twitch

Twitter: HallowdGames (@HallowdG) / Twitter

I added Elsen from Off as a little cameo.
